hero.title: Operational Excellence for Systematic Growth
hero.subtitle: I'm Giulia Merri, Operations Specialist combining Swiss precision with Nordic innovation. With over ten years of experience in shaping and optimizing operational processes, I help ambitious companies across DACH and Nordic markets achieve systematic growth through operational excellence.

operations_foundation.title: Strategic Operations Foundation
operations_foundation.investment: Operational Excellence in the Investment Environment
operations_foundation.investment_desc: Several years of experience in designing and optimizing operational processes with a focus on efficient, scalable workflows and systematic structuring in an international investment context. Development and optimization of governance processes, organization of board meetings and dealflow documentation, as well as standardization of operational procedures to ensure seamless investment operations.
operations_foundation.cultural_desc: Proven ability to navigate and optimize operations across Swiss and Nordic business cultures, with comprehensive understanding of regulatory requirements and cultural adaptation strategies for international expansion. Native-level cultural intelligence enabling seamless business integration across DACH and Nordic markets.
operations_foundation.systematic_desc: Demonstrated expertise in designing operational frameworks that support business growth, from startup phases through systematic scaling, with focus on sustainable operational excellence. Specialization in creating scalable systems that maintain quality standards while accommodating rapid organizational development.
operations_foundation.organizational_des: Experience in supporting the development of operational structures, creating training and onboarding systems, and implementing systematic approaches to team coordination and performance optimization across diverse business environments.
how_we_work.title: How We Work Together
how_we_work.discovery_desc: Comprehensive operational analysis and growth opportunity identification. We explore your current operational challenges, growth objectives, and systematic optimization potential through structured assessment methodology.
how_we_work.planning_desc: Collaborative operational framework design tailored to your specific growth objectives. Together we architect systematic solutions perfectly aligned with your business culture, market position, and strategic goals.
how_we_work.implementation_desc: Systematic execution of operational excellence initiatives with regular milestone reviews, comprehensive progress tracking, and adaptive optimization based on real-world performance data and emerging business needs.
how_we_work.optimization_desc: Regular refinement and strategic scaling of operational systems as your business evolves, ensuring sustainable growth capacity and operational resilience through changing market conditions.
how_we_work.philosophy: Partnership Philosophy: Embedded collaboration, not external consulting
